summary: This is MainMenu mod by Expired without Bethesda logo.
descriptionHtml:
First go on [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64948]MainMenu[/url] page and endorse!


[color=#00ff00][b]Description[/b][/color]
Remove Bethesda logo in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64948]MainMenu mod by Expired[/url] from lower left corner of screen.


[color=#00ff00][b]Installation
[/b][/color]There are 2 versions, just like with MainMenu mod. Choose between Loose files and ESP-BSA version in FOMOD installer.


[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/pHWkKsT.png[/img][/center]
[color=#00ff00][b]Credits[/b][/color]
All credits goes to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]Expired[/url] for creating awesome [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64948]MainMenu[/url] mod, and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/users/10324035]Wenderer[/url] for creating, again awsome, FOMOD Creation Tool


[color=#00ff00][b]Tools used[/b][/color]
[color=#1e84cc][url=http://www.sothink.com/product/flashdecompiler/]Sothink SWF Decompiler[/url][/color]
[color=#1c4587][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/6821]FOMOD Creation Tool
[/url][/color]

[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/1qbZwHc.png[/img]﻿﻿[/center][center][/center]
author: nesho82
